component.description: SubmitCommand provides a way to easily submit a form via Ajax and process its result.

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Name of the javascript function generated from this markup.

attribute.name: url
attribute.description: Destination URL for POST'ing the submitted form.

attribute.name: form
attribute.description: ID of the form to submit.

attribute.name: statusTitle
attribute.description: The title used for displaying the return status of this command.

attribute.name: successMessage
attribute.description: Message to display if the submit is successful (status 200).

attribute.name: successAction
attribute.description: JavaScript action to execute when the submit is successful.

attribute.name: errorAction
attribute.description: JavaScript action to execute when the submit is unsuccessful.

attribute.name: pendingMessage
attribute.description: Message to display if the container is offline and the submit is queued (status 999).

attribute.name: errorMessage
attribute.description: Message to display if the request fails.
